duplicateHabitFoundMessage: Only one habit of the same type can be added.
errorGenericMessage: Something is wrong and we're not quite sure what it is. Please refresh the page or check back later.
habitListEmpty: Add a habit, and get to work.
habitMaxReached: You can't have more than five habits...
habitMaxReachedMessage: Research suggests you are more likely to achieve attainable goals. If you want to add another habit, delete one first.
streakDefinition: A streak is when you complete habits on consecutive days. Making streaks is key to forming long lasting habits.
todayHabitsCompleted: Congratulations. You've completed all of your habits today. See you tomorrow.
todayNoHabits: You don't have any habits to complete today.
unauthorizedMessage: We're having trouble recognizing you. Try signing out and back in.
